summary:
This mod simply changes the respawn cells cleared timer from original 1 month (720Hours)
to 3 days (72Hours).
I also changed the respawn timer of all cells from original 10 days (240Hours)
descriptionHtml:
******************************
Fast Respawn 72 Hours
******************************

******************************
Description:
******************************

This mod simply changes the respawn cells cleared timer from original 1 month (720Hours)
to 3 days (72Hours).
I also changed the respawn timer of all cells from original 10 days (240Hours)
to 1 day (24Hours).
I took a inspiration from Fallout 3 and Fallout New Vegas to create this mod when i started to play Skyrim again.
I realized that respawn in Skyrim takes too much time ;)
So i decided to make respawn time faster just like it is originaly in Fallout 3 or Fallout New Vegas.

******************************
Settings:
******************************
I have created few plugins that should suit your tastes.

Fast Respawn 144Hours (Respawn cells cleared 144Hours/Respawn all cells 72Hours)
Fast Respawn 168Hours (Respawn cells cleared 168Hours/Respawn all cells 96Hours)
Fast Respawn 240Hours (Respawn cells cleared 240Hours/Respawn all cells 120Hours)
Fast Respawn 360Hours (Respawn cells cleared 360Hours/Respawn all cells 180Hours)

My timescale in Skyrim is set to 10 (1minute in real life = 10minutes in Skyrim)
and it works fine for me ;)


******************************
Install:
******************************

Extract the plugin from the archive and place it in your Skyrim data folder and activate it using Skyrim Launcher.

******************************
Uninstall:
******************************

Remove the plugin from your Skyrim data folder.

******************************
Changelog:
******************************

1.0 - Initial realease.

1.2 - Added new files to suit your needs.

******************************
Credits:
******************************

Bethesda: For making Skyrim :)
M.Le Siks (ProG4M3R)<--- me xDDD

This mod is free you can do whatever you want with it but if you want to reupload mod on Nexus or another side
please add proper credits and link to original mod. Enjoy :)
author: ProG3M3R
